page.title: 14Recreation
page.content:
RECREATION.
Trebarwith Strand. A lively stream dashes and tumbles down a rocky slate gully on to the sandy beach.Dotted aound the beach are islands of grey slate sculpted by the sea.
"To the beach" by Joanne Bradley. I only live a mile away from Trebarwith beach.Now we can go surfing because we have got a surfboard. Last year a man found a white jelly fish.He said at first he thought it was a human skull.When he brought it in, he put it on some rocks.It was huge.When mum knew, we had to go home.
